name: Dirzuga Ohao
title: Flaah Cultivator
abilityWindow: When an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for would be resolved:
abilityText: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on a planet that does not contain other players’ units and is adjacent to a planet you control.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Solann Aun Kamaki
title: Punish Ambivalence
abilityWindow: When a player with readied planets abstains:
abilityText: You may force that player to remove 1 token from their tactic pool and return it to their reinforcements.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: What Hope Flees From
title: Inexorable Doom
abilityWindow: After an outcome is resolved:
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may capture 1 unit from your reinforcements with a cost less than or equal to the number of players that cast votes for the resolved outcome.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: San Omairo
title: Pathmaker
abilityWindow: Before an outcome is resolved:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose a player who voted for that outcome. If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may place or move a Creuss wormhole token into a non-home system that contains a planet that player controls.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Cuventa
title: The Lidded Eye
abilityWindow: After an agenda is revealed:
abilityText: You may predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, you may place a frontier token in a system that does not contain any planets and does not already have a frontier token.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Huldran
title: Return On Investment
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: Each other player that voted for that agenda may gain 1 trade good.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Yaluga Huin
title: Dean of Patents
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: Place a control token on a technology you own. Players must place 1 trade good on this card to research technologies with your control tokens. At the end of the status phase, gain the trade goods on this card.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Elder Junn
title: Qualified Immunity
abilityWindow: When a “Directive” agenda is resolved:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card and spend a command token from your strategy pool to ignore the effects of that agenda.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: A6AH3
title: Calculated Presence
abilityWindow: After an outcome is resolved:
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may exhaust this card and remove 1 of your dreadnoughts adjacent to Mecatol Rex from the board to discard the agenda instead; it is resolved with no effect and is not replaced.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Legate Erran
title: Wheels Of Industry
abilityWindow: After an outcome is resolved:
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may choose a system that contains 1 of your space docks. Replace 1 of your non-fighter ships in that system with a dreadnought from your reinforcements, or place 1 cruiser or destroyer in that system.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Keer En Hanaan
title: Archon Of Unity
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to choose a player who can vote who did not vote for that outcome. Replace 1 command token in your fleet pool with 1 from that player’s reinforcements if it does not already contain 1 of that player's tokens.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Cador Gim
title: An Offer You Can’t Refuse
abilityWindow: You may exhaust this card before a player casts votes:
abilityText: That player must cast at least 1 vote for an outcome of your choice, if able, or give you 2 trade goods or 1 promissory note.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Moltosh
title: Feed The Flames
abilityWindow: After an outcome is resolved:
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may gain a command token and place it in your strategy pool.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: H'eyra
title: Subtle Whisperer
abilityWindow: After the speaker abstains or votes on an agenda:
abilityText: You may exhaust 1 planet you control and cast additional votes equal to its influence value.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Tam And Kurn
title: Horizon Walkers
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may look at the top card of an exploration deck. If it is a relic fragment, you may exhaust this card to gain it.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Nekro Incisul
title: Network Infiltrator
abilityWindow: After an agenda is revealed:
abilityText: Choose an outcome and a player. If that player votes for that outcome, they cast additional votes equal to the number of technologies that player owns that you also own.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Kkarom Vett
title: Retrograde Negotiator
abilityWindow: After the speaker abstains or votes on an agenda you cast 5 or more votes on:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to change your vote to abstain, then ready up to 3 planets you control.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Qui'rek
title: Broodmaster
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may place 2 fighters from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Kelg Melkov
title: Logistics Officer
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may move 1 of your ships to an adjacent system that contains 1 or more of your ships or space docks.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Ronald Wiley
title: Political Rally
abilityWindow: After an outcome you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for is resolved:
abilityText: You may ready each planet you control in 1 system.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Hermetecon
title: The Seeker
abilityWindow: After an outcome is resolved:
abilityText: If you predicted or cast 5 or more votes for another outcome, you may exhaust this card and choose a player who voted for the resolved outcome. Place or move 1 sleeper token onto a non-home planet that player controls that does not have a sleeper token.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Perdin Perdona
title: Echoes Of The Lazax
abilityWindow: When you cast votes:
abilityText: Choose either your home planet or Mecatol Rex. If you control that planet, you can vote using its influence value without exhausting it, even if it is exhausted.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: The Brothers Qquiar
title: Coalition Builders
abilityWindow: At the end of the agenda phase:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card to look at the top 3 cards of the agenda deck, then choose 1 to reveal. Players vote on this agenda.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Brother Rhal
title: Evangelist
abilityWindow: When you cast votes:
abilityText: You may remove 1 infantry from a planet you control to exhaust 1 adjacent planet controlled by another player and cast additional votes equal to that planet’s influence value.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase

name: Ne Ruk
title: Secret Keeper
abilityWindow: When another player discards an action card during the agenda phase:
abilityText: You may exhaust this card and discard an action card to take that action card from the discard pile.
unlockCondition: At the start of the agenda phase
